name: Learn Git workflow
summary: New to Git? Learn how to use Git process for updating your repo. Blackbaud has adopted Git as a standard version control for Azure DevOps and GitHub.

name: Edit Stache online
summary: Do you have a small edit? Learn how to use Azure DevOps to make your change without leaving your web browser.

name: Branch policies & security
summary: Azure DevOps Git Repos are set up with standard policies and security. If necessary, learn how to edit them for your Stache SPA.
